discussion.content: As both the price list and the competitor entities are organization owned, you can't limit data by using business units. I dont see the point of exporting any of them to a static list. Both entities can be controlled by a security role, by means of adding/removing priviliges...so I guess both should be 'add a security role'?

comments.content: Yes, it doesn't make sense to me on exporting the list. The question do not have any information on whether it is a statics worksheet. It should be granting the manager to read the competitor list to get the update list.

The question mentioned "You need to ensure that new managers receive the information they need."
The fact that it uses the word "receive" almost sound like the manager are expecting a file, instead of to "view" the data in system. But of course, I could be overthinking it.
